mapper.insert: INSERT INTO host (member_email, host_address, host_type, host_intro) VALUES (#{member_email},#{host_address},#{host_type},#{host_intro})
mapper.select: SELECT host_num FROM host WHERE member_email = #{member_email} ORDER BY host_num DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO host_imgs (host_num, img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6) VALUES (#{host_num}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{img5}, #{img6})

INSERT INTO host_provide_items (item1, item2, item3, item4, item5, item6, item7, item8, item9, item10) VALUES (#{item1},#{item2},#{item3},#{item4},#{item5},#{item6},#{item7},#{item8},#{item9},#{item10})
